name: arXivSearch
author: MatchaTeaLeaf
description: Search for papers on arXiv with links to .pdf, DOI and authors. Uses arXiv API wrapper by Lukas Schwab.
install_msg: Thank you for installing arXivSearch. This cog make use of the arXiv API wrapper by Lukas Schwab. Thank you to arXiv for use of its open access interoperability.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
